text:
Okay, I am going to record today and send here

Tks

@channel  I have created one module with form in which loggedin user (using membership )can upload profile picture.
That field is file type and after submitting form it's string image with portal url.
I mean we can't access that image if we are not loggedin to HubSpot portal.
Can someone please help me ?
<https://api-eu1.HubSpot.com/form-integrations/v1/uploaded-files/signed-url-redirect/80711407578>?.......
